der.fuckyou: This ship cannot install the following hullmods:
der.armordmg_reduction: decrease in Armor damage to the ship.
der.highexplose_reduction: decrease in High Explosive damage to the ship.
der.energy_reduction: decrease in Energy damage to the ship.
der.speed_desc: 'So you know we love Hit&Run tatics? So I found a way to maximise our engines even better!'
der.reconstruction_desc: 'Ok so bring me as much garbage as you can salvage from raids, we are going to remake them COMPLETLY.'
der.flux_desc: So I have found a way to increase flux dissapoition of the ship... But the maintence cost will upset you...
der.construction_desc: 'You know what they gave me when I sent them the first blueprint? Crack. I love our Leader.'
der.Ornium: -Arthur Ornium, the creater of Ornium Shipyards Style Construction
